thread.section_title: Choice Home Warranty Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Choice Home Warranty | www.choicehomewarranty.com | 3 of 111
thread.title: Michael Brito
thread.title_full: Choice Home Warranty reviewed by Michael Brito

author: Michael Brito
title: Michael Brito
text: Had a plumbing issue in one of my rentals on the first day of coverage. Choice contracted the job out and provided me with their contact information within minutes. Technician came out next day, fixed the problem, collected service fee (very affordable/competitive, I might add) and was out the door. Smooth and painless process. Thanks!
